scripts.//dev: I wish we could --follow-symlinks with chokidar instead of listing ../lib/src, but --follow-symlinks doesn't seem to work on dirs
scripts.dev: yarn run build; concurrently --raw "budo --port 8000 --dir dist --live" "chokidar 'assets/**/*' --debounce 50 -c 'yarn run _build:assets'" "chokidar 'src/**/*.elm' '../lib/src/**/*.elm' --debounce 50 -c 'yarn run _build:elm'"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn run _build:assets && yarn run _build:elm
